descriptionHtml:
Simple Spell Scaling
================
Version: 1.0
Date: 08/02/12
Author: jonnyeah
================


=============
-Description-
=============
Scales the power of any Destruction or Restoration spells based on skill, with a maximum increase of 40% at 100 skill.

This applies to literally any Destruction or Restoration spell, including those added by mods, and requires nothing more than enabling the .esp.

==============
-Installation-
==============
1. Move the contents of the rar file to your /data folder.
2. Activate Simple Spell Scaling.esp

================
-Uninstallation-
================
1. Remove Simple Spell Scaling.esp and .bsa.

===========
-Changelog-
===========

Version 1.0 (08/02/12)
- Official Release
